name: Tanger Factory Outlet Centers, Inc.
description: Tanger Factory Outlet Centers, Inc. is a leading owner and operator of outlet shopping centers, providing consumers with a wide range of brand-name merchandise at discounted prices. Founded in 1981 by Stanley Tanger, the company has established a strong presence in the retail real estate sector with a portfolio of high-quality outlet centers across the United States and Canada. Tanger's properties are strategically located in prime retail markets and feature a diverse mix of retailers, from high-end fashion brands to athletic wear and home goods. The company is committed to enhancing the shopping experience through attractive property designs, customer service, and community engagement. Tanger Factory Outlet Centers also emphasizes sustainability and social responsibility, implementing eco-friendly practices within its operations. With a focus on innovation and adapting to changing retail environments, Tanger continues to be a key player in the outlet shopping industry, offering unique experiences for shoppers while delivering value to its investors.

seo.meta_title: Tanger Factory Outlet Centers, Inc. | Discounted Brand-Name Shopping
seo.meta_description: Explore Tanger Factory Outlet Centers, Inc., a leader in outlet shopping. Discover a wide range of brand-name merchandise at discounted prices in our centers across the US and Canada.

faq.question: What does Tanger Factory Outlet Centers do?
faq.answer: Tanger Factory Outlet Centers operates outlet shopping centers that offer discounted brand-name merchandise.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Tanger Factory Outlet Centers?
faq.answer: Stephen Yalof is the CEO of Tanger Factory Outlet Centers, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Tanger headquartered?
faq.answer: Tanger is headquartered in Greensboro, North Carolina, USA.

faq.question: What types of products can I find at Tanger Outlets?
faq.answer: You can find a variety of products including apparel, home goods, and accessories at Tanger Outlets.
